translations: v．完成，敲定，最终确定：使某事物达到最终状态，不再需要进一步修改或讨论。
· The contract was finalized after several rounds of negotiation.
经过几轮谈判后，合同最终敲定。

sentences.sentence: The draft of this article has been finalized [done].
California's plan, which is expected to be finalized by the governor next year, should serve as a model.
sentences.translation: 预计将在明年由州长敲定的加州计划应该成为一个典范。

sentences.sentence: We are saying nothing until all the details have been finalized.
sentences.translation: 在所有细节最终确定之前我们无可奉告。
